alert.note: Alert for Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rawlins and south central Hitchcock Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Atwood, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Rawlins and south central Hitchcock Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
